@Scott630CHED @Alexthecarrigan @elmhirst_jamie @drex I think a hefty fine is the appropriate response. Stiff fine over stiff arm, in my opinion.

@Alexthecarrigan @elmhirst_jamie @drex My point was that our collective tolerances for things have changed -- assault, included. So this fan trespassed. That fact does not give player right to potentially injure him. This is my take -- it does not require your endorsement -- and vice versa.

@Alexthecarrigan @elmhirst_jamie @drex Not saying he'd be charged but, having lived through 1982, I can say, with some confidence, that one cannot get away with what one got away with, back in that day. See: drinking and driving, schoolyard fighting, buying smokes for your dad, getting hit by your teacher, etc.
These people are unbelievable. https://t.co/Y3K3dIo7P4

@elmhirst_jamie @drex Yes, it's assault. Imagine if the player punched him in the face? Reaction would be very different. He could've seriously messed this guy up. Fan was stupid to do it but did not deserve to get flattened by an armour-plated athlete.
